sentence.text: The deregulation of its expression or activity contributes to leukemia, in which hypermethylation of CpG island can be either an oncogene or a tumor suppressor.

Herein we explored whether cellular senescence, an anti-tumoral pathway that restrains cell proliferation, is a mechanism by which hypermethylation of CpG island limits hematopoietic cell expansion, and thus prevents the development of leukemia.
